TagScript Doc.description: Generates the Docs Comment (Advanced NotSoBot TagScript #1)

Set Argument.description: Set an argument for the function (Advanced NotSoBot TagScript #1)

Get Argument.description: Gets an argument of the function (Advanced NotSoBot TagScript #1)

Delete Argument.description: Deletes an argument when ending the function (Advanced NotSoBot TagScript #1)

Return.description: Returns a value when ending the function (Advanced NotSoBot TagScript #1)
